message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your offer, but $200 is my bottom line. I can't go any lower.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $150?
